verse:
यः सर्वज्ञः सर्वविद् यस्य ज्ञानमयं तपः।
तस्मादेतद् ब्रह्म नाम रूपमन्नं च जायाते ॥
meaning: The one who is all knowing, who has perfect knowledge and understanding of everything, whose essence is nothing but knowledge itself, through that knowledge alone, this Brahma (the supreme reality) is formed, as name and form (name and form refer to the manifestation and creation of the universe).
